document.full_text: justin harper scored 19 points and kevin anderson added 14, helping 12th-seeded richmond advance to the round of 16 for the first time since 1988.
document.title: west: richmond 65, morehead state 48: no. 12 seed richmond knocks off morehead state
lines_and_colors: justin harper scored 19 points and kevin anderson added 14, helping 12th-seeded richmond advance to the round of 16 for the first time since 1988.
